
```{r}

wbb_rosters <- wbb_rosters %>% 
mutate(player_state = case_when(
    str_detect(hometown, "MD") ~ "Maryland",
    str_detect(hometown, "Md.") ~ "Maryland",
     TRUE ~ hometown))

wbb_rosters %>% 
filter(player_state == "Maryland") %>% 
group_by(team) %>% 
count() %>% 
arrange(desc(n))
```
